targets.expr: avg by (nqn) (sum by(gw_name, nqn) (ceph_nvmeof_host_connection_state{instance=~'$gateway'} * on (instance) group_left(group) ceph_nvmeof_gateway_info{group=~'$group'}))

panels.description: The sum of capacity from all namespaces defined to subsystems

targets.expr: sum(avg by (group) (sum by(group, instance) (ceph_nvmeof_bdev_capacity_bytes{instance=~'$gateway'} * on (instance) group_left(group) ceph_nvmeof_gateway_info{group=~'$group'})))

panels.title: Capacity Exported

panels.description: WARNING if any subsystem is defined with open/no security
panels.title: Subsystem Security

panels.description: Shows the highest average CPU on a gateway within the gateway group
panels.title: Top 5 Busiest Gateway CPU

panels.description: Show the subsystems by the count of namespaces they present to the client
panels.title: Top 5 Subsystems by Namespace

panels.description: Show the subsystems by the count of namespaces they present to the client

targets.expr: topk(5, avg by (nqn) (sum by(gw_name, nqn) (ceph_nvmeof_host_connection_state{instance=~'$gateway'} * on (instance) group_left(group) ceph_nvmeof_gateway_info{group=~'$group'})))

panels.title: Top 5 Subsystems with Most Connected Clients
